beer.beer_description: Sambrook’s Pale Ale is our inaugural craft keg product and is a beer born out of innovation. We have taken a German lagering technique known as Krausening and married this to a traditional British Pale Ale recipe. Dispensing the craft keg, unfiltered and unpasteurised, creates a fantastically flavoured craft keg beer with a light natural haze.  Maris Otter Pale Malt, Admiral, First Gold, Celeia and New Zealand Hallertau Hops.
